name: TR Register Only
author: TechieResource

sections.description: Tr Registered only is a plugin to make all of your WordPress blog/site protected. Once this plugin is enabled, the WordPress powered site or blog (including Pages,post,custom posts) will be accessible only to logged users, registered users only can access the site . This plugin is useful while developing site, or a private blog.
sections.installation:
Install and Activate

  1. Unzip the downloaded tr-register-only zip file
  2. Upload the tr-register-only folder and its contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation
  3. Activate TR Register Only from Plugins page

short_description: Tr Registered only is a plugin to make all of your WordPress blog/site protected, registered users only can access the site.
